channel.title: CVE Feed for SayenThemes -- all

item.title: CVE-2021-24284|2024-08-03T19:28:22.818Z -- sayenthemes -- kaswara%20modern%20vc%20addons
item.description: The Kaswara Modern VC Addons WordPress plugin through 3.0.1 allows unauthenticated arbitrary file upload via the 'uploadFontIcon' AJAX action. The supplied zipfile being unzipped in the wp-content/uploads/kaswara/fonts_icon directory with no checks for malicious files such as PHP.
